snippet: Broward Circuit Judge Thomas Lynch has suspended enforcement of a Fort Lauderdale law that restricts the public feeding of homeless people for 30 days and ordered mediation on the issue.
abstract: Florida Judge Thomas Lynch imposes 30-day suspension on enforcement of Fort Lauderdale law that restricts public feeding of homeless people and orders mediation on issue.
lead_paragraph: Broward Circuit Judge Thomas Lynch has suspended enforcement of a Fort Lauderdale law that restricts the public feeding of homeless people for 30 days and ordered mediation on the issue.

headline.main: Florida: Law Barring Feeding of Homeless Is Blocked
headline.print_headline: Florida: Law Barring Feeding of Homeless Is Blocked
